column3: str

Maru is evaluating you with an unsettling look.

※Please note that the difficulty of this quest has been synced to your current level. Furthermore, you may not proceed with a class or job that is different from when you accepted this quest.
Deliver the elegant purse to Khanga.
Deliver the pouch of mysterious dried goods to the Lominsan visitor.
Deliver the familiar wooden crate to Maru.
Tell me, <Split(<Highlight>ObjectParameter(1)</Highlight>, ,1)/>─you're from Eorzea, ain't you?
Just so happens we've got a deal lined up with an Eorzean trader, but... We don't want no trouble, is all. You don't mind actin' as my middleman, do you?
Alright, you'll need to pick up our side of the bargain from a fisher called Khanga in Akyaali. Hand him this─he'll know what to do.
Take what he gives you to the Eorzean trader at the docks in Yedlihmad, an' then report back with the goods once you've finished. Easy, right?
Hm? What brings you here?
Ah. Maru's “favor,” yes... I see you've brought payment in full.
He wanted these seen safely into the hands of a certain Lominsan visitor. I assume I can trust you with the rest?
Have you not a delivery to make?
Ho, there! You wouldn't happen to be Master Maru's associate, now would you?
Oh, good! I've been eagerly awaiting your arrival, <If(PlayerParameter(4))>miss<Else/>sir</If>. Yours is my final trade, so it's back to the diamond of the Rhotano I go.

These? Why, they're the finest dried ingredients this side of the Bounty! Make for a glorious soup stock...and fetch a glorious price, at that. Limsa Lominsa is a culinary capital, after all. For her chefs, only the very best will suffice.
Well then, a pleasure doing business with you! This crate contains Master Maru's goods─send him my regards, yes?
Did the deal go alright?
Brilliant! I knew you were the right <If(PlayerParameter(4))>woman<Else/>man</If> for the job. I reckoned that skipper might've skipped clear away if one of us came lumberin' at him, fish or no...
Oh, this? It's a prototype for a new kinda wheel. There's this really reputable company in Limsa that's comin' up with upgrades for our carts.
We've gotta make sure we can handle any road now that we're ridin' all over the island. Can't wait to give these a spin...
